alert.note: Alert for Bellevue and Vicinity; Bremerton and Vicinity; East Puget Sound Lowlands; Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 10:23AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong line of thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kitsap...southwestern Snohomish...northwestern King and northwestern Pierce Counties through 1045 AM PDT... At 1022 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seattle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Seattle, Bellevue, Everett, Kent, Edmonds, Carnation, Renton, Redmond, Kirkland, Sammamish, Lynnwood, Bothell, Burien, Issaquah, Des Moines, Mukilteo, Mountlake Terrace, Mill Creek, Monroe and Woodinville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; Bremerton and Vicinity; East Puget Sound Lowlands; Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area
